name: Nukes 'r' Fun!
description:
Join Nukie in a fun atomic adventure where you explore the world of nuclear deterrents! Learn all about international defense agreements and mutually assured destruction in this nuclear experience for all the family!

Controls

Confirm: X

Up/Down: Select country

Left/Right: Change between y/n

Made for the Chip 'n Jam: Summer 2020 speedrun. The theme was "Educational" games.

There were optional modifiers to try and incorporate into your game for extra brownie points. Here is my justification for the 3:

Speedrunnable - You can mash through text but that's about it.  No measure of time to completion or bonus for ending quickly.
Limited Palette - It only has 2 colours. Black and green. I think I passed with flying colours here.
Morality - It's about nuking countries so I guess there's some morality involved there?

‘I begin to believe in only one civilising influence—the discovery one of these days of a destructive agent so terrible that War shall mean annihilation and men’s fears will force them to keep the peace” - Wilkie Collins
